body_html:
I'm seeing lots of potential causes for dlopen causing sigbus: https://www.google.com/webhp?sourceid=chrome-instant&ion=1&espv=2&ie=UTF-8#q=bus+error+on+dlopen

I'll close this for now, please reopen if you find that problem lies with TensorFlow rather than with system dlopen call
